title: Single Name.
description: Includes the Arabic text with transliteration and meaning.
name: GetAsmaAlHusna

Parameter.description: Names are numbered from 1 to 99, in the order usually recited in the Islamic tradition. They start with 1 (Ar Rahmaan) and end with 99 (As Saboor).

examples.title: Success-Response:
Error-Response:

title: All or Multiple Names
name: GetMultiAsmaAlHusna
description: Includes the Arabic text with transliteration and meaning of each name.

Parameter.description: Names are numbered from 1 to 99, in the order usually recited in the Islamic tradition. They start with 1 (Ar Rahmaan) and end with 99 (As Saboor). If not specified, all names will be returned.
